Articles.Content:
Anyone else heard?

http://io9.com/keep-flyin-an-exclusive-first-look-at-firefly-online-1481677328/@tinaamini

Personally I'M EXCITED!
I've never had the slightest interest in online games, but a Firefly universe just might make me have to change my mind.
Never watched firefly, so I don't care

I haven't seen the whole series but what I have seen I really enjoyed, so this is exciting to see. Totally gonna play the heck out of it when it comes out!

"No one wants to disappoint Joss." Darn right! Make it good, Quantum Mechanix!

Never watched firefly, so I don't care

I'm always fascinated by the ability of certain shows (Firefly is one, but Dr Who is another) that causes people to feel the need to broadcast their disinterest in them.

Some of the still images released look a bit dated as far as what online games can do, but they're good enough.

I'm wondering how the game play will be implemented. Maybe something like Star Trek online, but with much more emphasis on first person and little or no space combat.

I'm always fascinated by the ability of certain shows (Firefly is one, but Dr Who is another) that causes people to feel the need to broadcast their disinterest in them.

Honestly I am interested a bit, but my TV channel dosen't broadcast it... no I don't have netflix.

YT To the rescuuuuuuuuuueeeeeeeeeeeee!

I am interested by anticipating disappointment.

Time will tell.

...much keen to loot me some Alliance goods!
I wonder if Reavers will be a playable faction.........or skin suits as craftable items.

........or skin suits as craftable items.

So many many hours of grinding and crafting for the full skin set? No thanks.

So many many hours of grinding and crafting for the full skin set? No thanks.

Like most things I eagerly anticipate that fill me with nothing but dissapointment when they finally launch, it is a possibility with this, but I am an optimistic not a pessimistic and I really hope they learn from other failures and make this an MMO with some depth.

The graphics, I'm not all that fussed about, and I can't imagine any of you are either, I mean we do play KSP and even now the graphic engine in it is getting a bit long in the tooth, hopefully the mystical 64bit Unity fixes that

I wonder if Reavers will be a playable faction.........or skin suits as craftable items.

OM GOD ! How did you think of that ?

OM GOD ! How did you think of that ?

Well even Malcolm put body art on the Serenity to disguise it as a Reaver ship.
WOW Something that could topple KSP as my top game...
